DOC.brief_summary: A study compare pre-operative administration rofecoxib versus post-operative administration diclofenac rofecoxib , respectively , treatment post-operative pain total knee joint replacement patient osteoarthritis knee .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Rofecoxib Treatment Post-Operative Pain After Total Knee Joint Replacement ( 0966-259 )
DOC.criteria: Males female least 18 year age osteoarthritis knee undergone total knee joint replacement .
